swings.feedback: Great shoulder turn, but your lead arm is bending too early. Keep it straighter through the top of the swing.
You're lifting your head just before impact. Try to keep your eyes down and maintain your spine angle longer.
Your balance is a bit off on this one. Try to keep more weight centered through your follow-through.
Nice tempo overall. To get more distance, work on creating more lag between your wrists and clubhead on the downswing.
Good setup and takeaway. Be careful not to sway too much laterally â€” stay more centered around your spine.
